description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini Spiral Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Zucchini Spiral Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a spiraliser or mandolin, julienne 700g zucchini and place in a bowl. Set aside. Process 1/2 cup firmly packed mint leaves, 1/2 cup firmly packed basil with 1/4 cup toasted chopped macadamias and 1 crushed garlic clove until finely chopped. Add 1/2 cup avocado oil, a good pinch of salt and 1 tbs lemon juice and process until smooth and well combined.

Gently toss herb dressing through the zucchini noodles to coat. Add 1 cup thawed peas, 1/2 cup drained halved semi-dried tomatoes, 1/2 cup chopped toasted macadamias. Peel, seed and chop 1 avocado and toss gently with 1 tbs lemon juice. Add avocado to vegetables, season to taste and gently toss together and serve.
